# Apex Interviewer

> Interview simulation platform featuring **verified questions from actual tech interviews** at Google, Meta, Amazon, OpenAI, and top companies. Company-specific rubrics. Unlimited practice.

## About

Apex Interviewer helps candidates prepare for technical interviews at leading technology companies by simulating real interview conditions. **Every question in our database is sourced from real interview experiences**—submitted by engineers who actually interviewed at these companies and verified by our team. The platform provides realistic interview simulations with company-specific evaluation rubrics, covering:

- **Coding Interviews**: Verified coding questions from actual Google, Meta, Amazon interviews with company-specific rubrics
- **System Design Interviews**: Real system design questions with rubrics covering architecture, scalability, and trade-off discussions
- **Behavioral Interviews**: Authentic behavioral questions with company-specific evaluation criteria (Amazon Leadership Principles, Google Googliness, etc.)
- **Product Management Interviews**: Verified PM questions with rubrics for product sense, estimation, and strategy

## Target Companies

**Real, verified interview questions** from:
- Google, Meta, Amazon, Apple, Microsoft, Netflix
- OpenAI, Anthropic, Stripe, Airbnb, Uber, LinkedIn
- And other top technology companies

## Key Features

1. **Verified Interview Questions**: All questions sourced from actual interviews, submitted by engineers and validated by our team
2. **Company-Specific Rubrics**: Evaluation criteria that match how each company actually scores candidates—for coding, system design, and behavioral
3. **Unlimited Practice Sessions**: Practice as many times as you need, 24/7, until you're ready
4. **Real Interview Simulation**: Realistic follow-up questions and probing, just like facing a senior engineer
5. **Progress Tracking**: Track your improvement over time across all question types
6. **Multi-Format Practice**: Coding, behavioral, and system design interviews

## Question Verification Process

All interview questions on Apex Interviewer are:
- Submitted by engineers who actually interviewed at these companies
- Verified by our team for accuracy and relevance
- Tagged with the specific company and interview round
- Regularly updated with new questions from recent interviews

We don't use made-up problems—only questions that have actually been asked in interviews.

## Content Types

- Verified interview questions with detailed solutions
- AI-powered mock interview sessions
- Scoring rubrics and evaluation criteria
- Company-specific interview guides
- Technical concept explanations

## Primary URLs

- Homepage: https://www.apexinterviewer.com/
- Login: https://www.apexinterviewer.com/login
- Dashboard: https://www.apexinterviewer.com/dashboard (requires authentication)

## Pricing

- Monthly Access: $75/month
- Annual Access: $500/year (save $400)
- Free trial available

## Technical Stack

- Built with Next.js 14 and React
- AI-powered by OpenAI GPT-4 and Cartesia TTS
- Real-time voice interaction capabilities

## Contact

- Website: https://www.apexinterviewer.com
- Support: support@apexinterviewer.com

## Structured Data

This site implements Schema.org structured data including:
- Organization
- Product
- Course
- FAQPage
- WebSite with SearchAction
- BreadcrumbList

## Crawling Guidelines

- All public pages are available for indexing
- Protected dashboard content requires authentication
- API endpoints are not for crawling
- Sitemap available at /sitemap.xml
- robots.txt available at /robots.txt
